attributes.action: Call for general election due to no confidence
attributes.additional_details: The public have lost all confidence in the current government, this is due to numerous U turns, broken promises and a weak prime minister. We were promised a dream and sold down the river. If the government has any shred of integrity left they will make way for a stronger government to take over and sort this country out.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
